AspNetZeroDemo.ChatUserSearch_Hint:
Write only username for same tenant users,
[tenancyName]\[userName] for other tenant's users

for example:
.\admin -> for host admin
Test\admin -> for test tenant's admin
admin -> for your tenant's admin

AspNetZeroDemo.DashboardDemo_Note_Info:
In this demo, you can use the left menu to test the application.
      This dashboard page is just for demonstration, but all other pages and functionalities are fully implemented, working and ready for production.
      You can add/apply your business requirements on this startup project (or remove any functionality you don't need).
      Thus, you can have a signification time gain to immediately start your own project requirements.
AspNetZeroDemo.DashboardDemo_Note_Title: Welcome to ASP.NET Zero startup project!
AspNetZeroDemo.DashboardNoteForMpaVersion: See Demo for Multi-Page Application version with ASP.NET MVC and jQuery.
AspNetZeroDemo.DashboardNoteForSpaVersion: Notice: There is also a Single-Page Application version built using ASP.NET MVC and AngularJs.

This page shows a few useful UI components those can be used in your application.
